item.title: Siemens Healthineers ATELLICA DATA MANAGER v1.1.1 / v1.2.1 / v1.3.1
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Healthineers https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/en-us/support-documentation/cybersecurity/cve-2021-44228 Community Resources Resource Link Siemens Healthineers https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/en-us/support-documentation/cybersecurity/cve-2021-44228 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Vulnerable NCSC-NL If you have determined that your Atellica Data Manager has a “Java communication engine” service, and you require an immediate mitigation, then please contact your Siemens Customer Care Center or your local Siemens technical support representative.
